title: Point 8 G
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses or to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not accurately respond to the question.

Question G: Identify the intended outcome of the proposed arrangement between Pliny the Younger and the recipient of this letter, as described in lines 6-8 (quamvis ipse…addet).

Examples that earn this point include the following:

  • Tacitus’s fame will add to Pliny the Elder’s fame

  • Tacitus’s writings will help make Pliny the Elder’s writings eternal

The response accurately responds to the question.
